entry.title: Sports betting platform @azuroprotocol which raised $11m from @Delphi_Digital @alliancedao @Arrington_Cap etc. announced their airdrop yesterday! They...
entry.summary:
Sports betting platform @azuroprotocol which raised $11m from @Delphi_Digital @alliancedao @Arrington_Cap etc. announced their airdrop yesterday! They are airdropping 56m $AZUR or 5.6% of the total supply to past users. TGE is expected at some point next week!
azuro: 🌊AZURO $AZUR AIRDROP 🪂 Just WEN you thought SEWN would never end and it was safe to go back in the water 🌊 📷$AZUR Snapshot 1 has been taken 🌊 Check your tokens in the Azuro App 🌊 Stake now to get benefits (time-limited until TGE) ⏰ There's still just a bit of time to…
